description: This script implements a command-line interface (CLI) tool for interactively navigating directories and executing Python scripts (cookbooks). It tracks failures and allows rerunning failed scripts with options for manual intervention.

methods.name: select_directory
methods.description: Interactively navigates directories, allowing the user to select or go back.

methods.name: run_python_script
methods.description: Executes a Python script, displaying output and handling errors.
